properties.areaDesc: Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 14 at 8:34AM PST until January 15 at 9:00PM PST by NWS San Francisco CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Small Craft Advisory, south winds 20 to 30 kt
with gusts up to 35 kt and seas 8 to 11 feet at 13 seconds
expected. For the Gale Watch, south winds 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 40 kt and seas 10 to 12 feet at 13 seconds
possible.

* WHERE...Waters from Point Arena to Point Reyes 10-60 NM.

* WHEN...For the Small Craft Advisory, from 9 AM to 9 PM PST
Wednesday. For the Gale Watch, from Wednesday evening through
late Wednesday night.

* IMPACTS...Strong winds can cause hazardous seas which could
capsize or damage vessels and reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
Mariners should consider altering plans to avoid possible
hazardous conditions.  Remain in port, seek safe harbor, alter
course, and/or secure the vessel for severe wind and seas.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 9 AM TO 9 PM PST WEDNESDAY... ...GALE WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY EVENING THROUGH LATE WEDNESDAY NIGHT
